Recipes.name: Grilled Eggplant and Tomato Stacks
Recipes.ingredients: Eggplant Slices, Tomato slice, Balsamic glaze,
Recipes.instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat, Brush both sides of eggplant slices with olive oil, Grill eggplant slices for about 3-4 minutes per side until they have grill marks and are tender, Assemble stacks by placing a grilled eggplant slice, followed by a tomato slice, and repeat, Spoon a dollop of dairy-free pesto on each stack, Drizzle with balsamic glaze just before serving.

Recipes.name: Quinoa and Vegetable Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté diced zucchini and corn in olive oil until softened.
In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, sautéed vegetables, and diced tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper.
Cut bell peppers in half, remove seeds, and stuff with the quinoa-vegetable mixture.
Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish and bake for about 25-30 minutes or until peppers are tender

Recipes.name: Gluten-Free Stir-Fried Rice
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add tofu or protein and stir-fry until browned.
Add mixed vegetables and continue to stir-fry until tender.
Add cooked rice and gluten-free tamari or coconut aminos. Stir until well combined and heated through.

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Squash Primavera
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cut the spaghetti squash in half lengthwise, remove seeds, and place cut side down on a baking sheet.
Roast for about 40-45 minutes or until the squash is easily pierced with a fork.
Meanwhile, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil until crisp-tender.
Scrape the spaghetti squash with a fork to create strands.
Combine spaghetti squash, sautéed vegetables, lactose-free tomato sauce, and season with salt and pepper.

Recipes.name: Cauliflower Pizza Crust with Veggie Toppings
ingredients: Vegetables of choice (bell peppers, mushrooms, olives)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Rice cauliflower and microwave or steam until tender. Allow it to cool.
Mix cauliflower with gluten-free flour to form a dough.
Press the dough onto a parchment-lined baking sheet to create a pizza crust.
Bake for about 15-20 minutes or until the crust is golden.
Top with lactose-free tomato sauce, dairy-free cheese, and your choice of veggies.
Return to the oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly

Recipes.name: Zucchini Noodles with Avocado Pesto
instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles and set aside.
In a blender or food processor, combine avocado, basil, garlic, pine nuts, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth.
Toss the zucchini noodles with the avocado pesto until well coated

Recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Lentil Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add sweet potatoes, lentils, chopped carrots, and spices. Cook for a few minutes.
Pour in gluten-free vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until lentils are tender.
Stir in spinach and let it wilt before serving

Recipes.name: Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms
ingredients: - Portobello mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed
Fresh herbs (e.g., parsley or thyme), chopped for garnish
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Brush the cleaned portobello mushrooms with olive oil and place them on a baking sheet, gill side up.
In a pan, sauté chopped spinach and minced garlic in olive oil until the spinach is wilted.
In a bowl, mix together sautéed spinach and garlic with cream cheese, grated Parmesan, and gluten-free breadcrumbs. Season with salt and pepper.
Spoon the stuffing mixture into the gill side of each portobello mushroom.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender.
Garnish with fresh herbs before serving

Recipes.name: Gluten-Free Tacos
ingredients: Ground meat (beef, turkey, or plant-based alternative)
instructions: Cook the ground meat in a pan over medium heat, seasoning it with gluten-free taco seasoning according to package instructions.
Warm the gluten-free corn tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Assemble tacos by placing a spoonful of seasoned meat onto each tortilla.
Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, salsa, and avocado slices.

Recipes.name: Cabbage Wraps with Tofu and Vegetables
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, zucchini, etc.), thinly sliced
instructions: Blanche the cabbage leaves in boiling water for a few seconds, then immerse them in ice water to stop cooking. Pat dry and set aside.
In a pan, sauté cubed tofu, sliced vegetables, and chopped green onions with gluten-free soy sauce, garlic powder, and a drizzle of sesame oil until vegetables are tender.
Spoon the tofu and vegetable mixture onto each cabbage leaf.
Roll the cabbage leaves to form wraps, securing with toothpicks if needed.
Garnish with sesame seeds before serving

Recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Roasted Brussels Sprouts
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss halved Brussels sprouts with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Spread the Brussels sprouts on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the Brussels sprouts are golden brown and crispy at the edges.
Remove from the oven and serve immediately. Adjust seasoning if necessary

Recipes.name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
ingredients: Fresh herbs (rosemary, thyme, or oregano), chopped
instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped herbs, salt, and pepper to create a marinade.
Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked, approximately 6-8 minutes per side

Recipes.name: Baked Lemon Dijon Chicken Thighs
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, minced garlic, salt, and pepper for the marinade.
Coat chicken thighs with the marinade and bake for about 30-35 minutes or until cooked through

Recipes.name: Coconut Lime Chicken
instructions: Mix coconut milk, lime juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper to create a marinade.
Marinate chicken thighs for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake the chicken until fully cooked

Recipes.name: Lemon Garlic baked Cod
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped parsley, salt, and pepper for the marinade.
Coat cod fillets with the marinade and bake for about 15-20 minutes or until flaky

Recipes.name: Salmon and Quinoa Patties
instructions: In a bowl, combine canned salmon, cooked quinoa, green onions, gluten-free breadcrumbs, Dijon mustard, beaten egg, salt, and pepper.
Form mixture into patties and fry in olive oil until golden brown on each side.

Recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice with Vegetables
instructions: In a pan, sauté minced garlic in olive oil.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Push vegetables to the side, pour beaten eggs into the pan, scramble, and mix with vegetables.
Add cooked rice and gluten-free soy sauce, stir until well combined.

Recipes.name: Shrimp and Avocado Salad
instructions: Season shrimp with salt and pepper, then sauté until fully cooked.
In a bowl, combine mixed greens, sliced avocado, cherry tomatoes, and cooked shrimp.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, toss gently.

Recipes.name: Grilled Lamb Kebabs
instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, salt, and pepper to create a marinade.
Marinate lamb chunks for at least 30 minutes.
Skewer the marinated lamb and grill until desired doneness.

Recipes.name: Herb-Crusted Baked Chicken Drumsticks
ingredients: Fresh herbs (thyme, rosemary, or parsley), chopped
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix olive oil, Dijon mustard, gluten-free breadcrumbs, chopped herbs, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Coat chicken drumsticks with the mixture and bake for about 30-35 minutes or until crispy

Recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Roasted Lamb Chops
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and pepper for the marinade.
Coat lamb chops with the marinade and roast for about 20-25 minutes or until desired doneness

Recipes.name: Spicy Backed Fish Tacos
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix olive oil, paprika, cumin, chili powder, and garlic powder.
Coat fish fillets with the spice mixture and bake until flaky.
Serve in gluten-free corn tortillas with cabbage slaw and avocado slices.

Recipes.name: Deviled Eggs with Smoked Salmon
ingredients: Smoked salmon, cut into small pieces
instructions: Scoop out egg yolks and mix with dairy-free mayo, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spoon or pipe the mixture back into egg white halves.
Top with smoked salmon and garnish with fresh dill.

Recipes.name: Chickpea Salad Sandwich
instructions: In a bowl, combine mashed chickpeas, diced celery, diced red onion, vegan mayo, and mustard.
Season with salt and pepper.
Spread the chickpea salad on gluten-free bread to make sandwiches.

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio with Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: Roasted vegetables (zucchini, cherry tomatoes, bell peppers)
instructions: Cook gluten-free spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté minced garlic in olive oil until golden. Add red pepper flakes if desired.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the garlic oil and top with roasted vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh parsley

Recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
instructions: Warm corn tortillas.
Spread mashed sweet potatoes on each tortilla.
Top with black beans, salsa, and avocado slices.
Garnish with fresh cilantro

Recipes.name: Vegan Stir-Fried Tofu with Broccoli
instructions: In a pan, sauté cubed tofu until golden.
Add broccoli and cook until tender-crisp.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, maple syrup, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic. Pour over tofu and broccoli.
Stir until well coated and serve over cooked rice. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Recipes.name: Quinoa Avocado Salad
instructions: - In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, diced avocado, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, and chopped cilantro.
- Squeeze lemon juice over the salad and toss until well combined.
- Season with salt and pepper.

Recipes.name: Tomato Basil Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup dried green or brown lentils, rinsed
instructions: - In a pot, sauté chopped onion and minced garlic until softened.
- Add rinsed lentils, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, dried basil, salt, and pepper.
- Simmer until lentils are tender.

Recipes.name: Vegan Mediterranean Bowl
instructions: Arrange cooked brown rice or quinoa in a bowl.
Add dollops of hummus, halved cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with fresh parsley

Recipes.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
instructions: Assemble a bowl with roasted sweet potatoes, cooked quinoa, steamed kale, and avocado slices.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and garnish with pumpkin seeds and fresh herbs if desired.

Recipes.name: Lentil and Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 3 tablespoons gluten-free tamari or soy sauce
instructions: In a wok or pan, stir-fry mixed vegetables, cooked lentils, minced ginger, and minced garlic in sesame oil.
Add gluten-free tamari or soy sauce and stir until well combined.

Recipes.name: Vegan Cauliflower Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Steam cauliflower until tender.
Blend cauliflower with minced garlic, nutritional yeast, almond milk, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Toss the cauliflower Alfredo sauce with cooked gluten-free pasta

Recipes.name: Chickpea and Spinach Coconut Curry
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and minced garlic.
Add chickpeas, coconut milk, curry powder, turmeric, vegetable broth, and fresh spinach.
Simmer until spinach is wilted.

Recipes.name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
ingredients: Roasted vegetables (sweet potatoes, Brussels sprouts, bell peppers)
instructions: Assemble a bowl with cooked quinoa, roasted vegetables, and avocado slices.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and garnish with pumpkin seeds and fresh herbs if desired
